# Particle Systems Vista Graphics supports particle systems for creating visual effects like fire, smoke, and sparks. ## Basic Particle `particles: [] add-particle particles x y vx vy life color animate [ update-particles particles draw-particles particles ]` ## Particle Properties - **Position**: x, y coordinates - **Velocity**: vx, vy speed - **Life**: How long particle lasts - **Color**: Particle color - **Size**: Particle size ## Particle Effects - Fire effect - Smoke effect - Sparks effect - Rain effect - Snow effect ## See Also - [Animation Basics](/vista/wiki/graphics/animation/animation-basics/) - Fundamentals - [Transition Effects](/vista/wiki/graphics/animation/transition-effects/) - Transitions
